metadata.name: Control Button Demo (Prequel)
metadata.description: Environment for control button demonstration with human (yellow) and robot (grey) agents. Features 3 control buttons and 3 rocks. Used for demonstrating how robots can program control buttons and humans can trigger them.
metadata.author: EMPO Framework
